title: --delete-before removes source file
body:
> What is your rclone version (eg output from `rclone -V`)

rclone v1.35-DEV
commit 980cd5bfd8cd7b855e04eb8291189ace2060a185

> Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

openSUSE Leap 42.2 64 bit
Debian jessie from docker golang:1.7

> Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

none, only local

> The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```bash
# setup
rclone copy $GOPATH/bin/rclone /tmp/foo/bin
cd /tmp/foo/bin/
# without delete-before is fine
rclone copy . .. -vv --include rclone
# with delete-before deletes /tmp/foo/bin/rclone
rclone copy . .. -vv --delete-before --include rclone
```

> A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

### without delete-before

```
2017/02/21 15:26:14 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.35-DEV" starting with parameters ["rclone" "copy" "." ".." "-vv" "--include" "rclone"]
2017/02/21 15:26:14 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/foo: Modify window is 1ns
2017/02/21 15:26:14 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/foo: Waiting for checks to finish
2017/02/21 15:26:14 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/foo: Waiting for transfers to finish
2017/02/21 15:26:14 INFO  : rclone: Copied (new)
2017/02/21 15:26:14 INFO  :
Transferred:   22.613 MBytes (194.216 MBytes/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 0
Transferred:            1
Elapsed time:       100ms
2017/02/21 15:26:14 DEBUG : Go routines at exit 4
2017/02/21 15:26:14 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.35-DEV" finishing with parameters ["rclone" "copy" "." ".." "-vv" "--include" "rclone"]
```

### with delete-before

```
2017/02/21 15:26:31 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.35-DEV" starting with parameters ["rclone" "copy" "." ".." "-vv" "--delete-before" "--include" "rclone"]
2017/02/21 15:26:31 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/foo: Modify window is 1ns
2017/02/21 15:26:31 INFO  : Waiting for deletions to finish
2017/02/21 15:26:31 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/foo: Waiting for checks to finish
2017/02/21 15:26:31 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/foo: Waiting for transfers to finish
2017/02/21 15:26:31 INFO  : bin/rclone: Deleted
2017/02/21 15:26:31 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/foo: Waiting for checks to finish
2017/02/21 15:26:31 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/foo: Waiting for transfers to finish
2017/02/21 15:26:31 INFO  :
Transferred:      0 Bytes (0 Bytes/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 1
Transferred:            0
Elapsed time:          0s
2017/02/21 15:26:31 DEBUG : Go routines at exit 4
2017/02/21 15:26:31 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.35-DEV" finishing with parameters ["rclone" "copy" "." ".." "-vv" "--delete-before" "--include" "rclone"]
```
